title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1001.8 - Fee for copies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1001.8 - Fee for copies

State Regulations

The fee for copies of records is hereby fixed at 25 cents
for each page or portion of a page measuring up to 9 inches by 14 inches, or
the actual cost of reproducing any other record, except when a different fee is
otherwise prescribed by statute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1001.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
